name: Яeverse
description:
Description : 

Яeverse is a multiplayer puzzle game made at the Global Game Jam 2022 and completed later. The theme of the jam was DUALITY.

Яeverse was made with a team of 6 !

Crédits :

- Coutelier Jérôme, Game Programmer - Leader of this project

-Charlet Samuel, Game Programmer

- Outteryck Romy, Game Designer

- Bastard Gabin, Game Designer

- Amies Leyna, Game Artist

- Aubart Adam, Game Artist

How to Play :

The game has to be played with controllers. You can play with a maximum of 4 persons (and we recommend this).

Enjoy the game!
